text:
Chaudhry Ahmad Mukhtar () (22 June 1946 – 25 November 2020) was a Pakistani politician and businessman. He was a member of the Pakistan Peoples Party. He was born in Lahore. From 2008 to 2012, he was the Minister of Defence. From 2012 to 2013, he was the Minister for Water and Power.
Mukhtar died on 25 November 2020 in Lahore, aged 74.
